attributes.action: impose a moratorium on all trackside clearance of vegetation across the country by Network Rail until a public inquiry has scrutinised their modus operandi
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since 2003, Network Rail has embarked on an excessive trackside vegetation clearance programme nationwide, which has culminated in the unnecessary loss of thousands of trees and wildlife habitats, in the guise of health and safety requirements. It is the opinion of the petitioners that the company's actions are tantamount to corporate vandalism on a national scale.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "impose a moratorium on all trackside clearance of vegetation across the country by Network Rail until a public inquiry has scrutinised their modus operandi."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21073
